alert.note: Alert for Cherokee (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 3:13PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Rutherford, southern Cleveland and north central Cherokee Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 313 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southeast of Forest City, or near Mooresboro, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Shelby, Gaffney, Boiling Springs NC, Patterson Springs, Ellenboro, Lattimore, Mooresboro, Earl, Cliffside and Henrietta. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
